channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken bittle over pavement and road, 13th August
item.description:
Nearly on junction with Haydens Close just along from 2 Northfield Ave. Small shards over pavement as hazard to dogs. Rest of it in road. Please attend. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northfield Avenue, Poverest, London

item.title: Fly tipping, 13th August
item.description:
More builders waste. Tipping on this seems to be happening every other day. Illegally parked vehicles hide the spot from the street. The ‘no parking sign’ close by has been defaced- covering the prohibition

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Empress Street, Walworth, London

item.title: 28 wilton house dumped stinking rubbish bag day 3, 13th August
item.description:
Please can someone remove the leaking stinking rubbish bag from outside 28 wilton house as the bag has now been there for 3 days and it stinks. Regards. wilton house residents. By the way Samantha Ranasinghe could you please talk to this tenant and advise them on how to behave in a hygeinic manner. Its every week pretty much some disgusting behaviour from this tenant.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albrighton Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting hidden behind overgrown tree canopies, 13th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Firs Lane, Edmonton, London

item.title: ;Not in use' cover missing., 13th August
item.description:

item.title: Dames drain cover, 13th August
item.description:
In Osidge Lane, at the junction withEast Walk, there is a drain cover which is “sticking up” instead of lying flat. Although not a major danger for cars etc. it is a significant danger for cyclists since part of the drain is uncovered. I did not notice if the cover was broken.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68, East Walk, Brunswick Park, London

item.title: Pepe's commercial waste left on pavement again, 13th August
item.description:
Pepe's shop keep leaving commercial waste of pavement and overflowing bins, which is against the law and council commercial waste disposal rules. They need to be penalised or closed, as this behaviour is like that in the last 18 months. This is bringing rats to the area. They need to leave the area. No other shop on this are does that.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Woolwich Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
